item.label: Anguilla
item.note: Coded [xi] (Saint Kitts-Nevis-Anguilla) before Jan. 1985. Code changed from [ai] to [am] in Mar. 1988

item.label: Kiribati
item.note: Coded [gn] (Gilbert and Ellice Islands) or [ln] (Central and Southern Line Islands) before Oct. 1978

item.label: Kosovo
item.note: Coded [rb] for Serbia from February 2007-May 2008. From 1992-April 2007 it was coded [yu] for Serbia and Montenegro

item.label: Marshall Islands
item.note: Coded [tt] (Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands) before Mar. 1988
item.useforref2: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

item.label: Micronesia (Federated States)
item.note: Coded [tt] (Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands) before Mar. 1988
item.useforref2: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

item.label: Montenegro
item.note: Coded [yu] for Serbia and Montenegro from 1992-April 2007

item.label: Morocco
item.useforref2: Zona Sur del Protectorado de Marruecos

item.label: Northern Mariana Islands
item.note: Coded [tt] (Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands) before Jan. 1985. Code changed from [nm] to [nw] in July 1987

item.label: Palau
item.note: Coded [tt] (Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands) before Mar. 1988
item.useforref2: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

item.label: Serbia
item.note: Coded [yu] for Serbia and Montenegro from 1992-April 2007

item.note: Code changed from [ui] to [uik] in Mar. 1988

item.label: Vietnam
item.note: Coded [vn] (Vietnam, North) or [vs] (Vietnam, South) before Jan. 1978
